name: resonance-echo-deck-netlify
description: Resonance Echo Deck application for Netlify

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && cp index.html metadata.json dist/ && cp -R components services hooks dist/ && esbuild index.tsx --bundle --outfile=dist/bundle.js --define:process.env.API_KEY=\"$GEMINI_API_KEY\" --loader:.ts=tsx --loader:.js=jsx --jsx=automatic --platform=browser --format=esm && cp -R public/* dist/ 2>/dev/null || true
